item.title: 10 pri Park Road, 8th February
item.description:

item.title: Dog fouling, 8th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beechcroft Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London

item.title: Footpath not designated as a footpath, 8th February
item.description:
The footpath linking Station Square and the level railway footbridge / Petts Wood Road, has been used by pedestrians for at least 40 years, and continues to be used by pedestrians. This footpath needs to be shown on the Council's Rights of Way Map..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 215-217, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and causing stones to break off, causing chips when cars drive fast over the stones., 8th February

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Downman Road, Eltham

item.title: Daily flytipping, 8th February
item.description:
Daily flytipping at this location, this is an ongoing problem and never seems to get resolved. This is a public health and safety issue. Please find the root cause and stop this from happening endlessly on this road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
